subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: In a three-game, post-Thanksgiving binge, three of the top four teams in the B.C.S. standings will face ranked opponents in games that could reshape the national title race.
snippet: In a three-game, post-Thanksgiving binge, three of the top four teams in the B.C.S. standings will face ranked opponents in games that could reshape the national title race.
